tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sculptures (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    loan_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE sculptures (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE exhibitions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exhibition_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),

    availability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE loans (
    loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

)

CREATE TABLE exhibitions (
    exhibition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

)

CREATE TABLE sculptures (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE exhibitions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exhibition_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE loans (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    loaned_to VARCHAR(255),
    loan_start_date DATE,
    loan_end_date DATE,
    return_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE movements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    movement_type VARCHAR(255),
    from_location VARCHAR(255),
    to_location VARCHAR(255),
    movement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sculptures (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	artist VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	available BOOLEAN NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE loans (
	loan_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	sculpture_id INT NOT NULL,
	start_date DATE NOT NULL,
	end_date DATE NOT NULL,
	contact_info VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE exhibitions (
	exhibition_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	exhibition_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	start_date DATE NOT NULL,
	end_date DATE NOT NULL,
	location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE artists (
	artist_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	nationality VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE locations (
	location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	location_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	address VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL
)
